pullrequest.title: Support mesh extrusion from polylines that consist of holes

content.raw:
I have a question about the change in the polyline data structure. The `geometry.proto` message is changing the polyline from `optional` to `repeated`. Since the `polyline.proto` message declares both `height` and `vertices` fields, this means that a polyline message will have multiple height values specified. Also the `polyline.world` has multiple `polyline` geometry elements.

The `PolylineShape` API's are changing to allow multiple sets of vertices, but not multiple height values. Do we need multiple height values?

Also, how are multiple sets of vertices interpreted? Is the first always a solid shape and any following sets of vertices will subtract? This should be clarified in the documentation.
